---
title: XR Toggle
---

This template demonstrates how to use the XRTransition component to smoothly switch between the default AR (passthrough) background and a fully immersive VR background. With a simple action, you can toggle between AR/VR modes and change the cylinder's and VR background color.

<b>On Desktop: Click</b>\<b>In XR: Pinch</b>

import {DocsIFrame} from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import {DocsSource} from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="9_xr-toggle"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="9_xr-toggle"></DocsSource>
